name: Super Rangers in Bullet Space
description:
Game submitted to Bullet Hell Jam 2022.
Theme: CONFINED.

📖Description

In Super Rangers in Bullet Space, you must survive the wild creatures that try to KILL YOU. Try to reach higher and higher scores in this super fun arcade game, by collecting the magic crystals!

⌨️Mouse & Keyboard Controls

Arrows - Movement 
Shift - Run
Space - Dash
F1 - Restart Game

🎮GamePad Controls (X360)

Left Analog Stick - Movement 
A - Run
X - Dash

Have fun!
